item.title: How to use GitHub
item.description: What is GitHub? One word: a code hosting platform allowing version control and collaboration. GitHub vs Git Git is local. Github is remote. Basics git init creates a new Git repository. git add adds a local change to the staging area, which is not synced until git commit git commit captures a snapshot of the staged changes – just like take a photo of the staged repository. git push uploads the commited respository to the remote repository.

item.title: CV
item.description: Sihao Gao (高思豪) MD/PhD Student @PUMCH Pediatrics Pediatric Immunology | Rheumatology | Inborn Errors of Immunity | Autoinflammation | Data Science | Genetics Email: sihao.gao@gmail.com Twitter: @SihaoGao ORCID: 0000-0001-8839-2982 Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=cg5EzYcAAAAJ Publications SCI Journals Zhang T, Yu Z, Gao S, Zhang Y, Wang C, Jian S, Wang L, Gou L, Li J, Ma M, Song H. Clinical phenotypes and prognosis of cytomegalovirus infection in the pediatric systemic lupus erythematosus: a longitudinal analysis.
